data.title: Blake Wilson - 2023-24 - Men's Basketball
data.meta_description:
Blake Wilson (12) Guard  - 2023-24: First-year team member.

High School: 2023 graduate of St. Pius X Catholic High School in Atlanta, Georgia ... All-State, All-Region
data.text:
2023-24: First-year team member.

High School: 2023 graduate of St. Pius X Catholic High School in Atlanta, Georgia ... All-State, All-Region and Team Captain as a senior, helping team to a regional championship … All-Region as a junior, helping team to a regional championship ... President's List ... High Honors or Honors each semester ... attended New Canaan High School in New Canaan, Connecticut as a freshman and sophomore ... participated in basketball and football ... High Honors or Honors each semester.

Personal: Son of Michael and Suzanne Wilson … has two sisters (Julianne, Riley) and one brother (Wyatt) … dad swam at Texas and Iona (NY) ... mom competed in track and field at Virginia … brother plays football at the Air Force Academy ... undecided on major … favorite TV show is Criminal Minds … favorite movie is Happy Gilmore ... favorite professional sports teams include the New York Giants and the Atlanta Hawks … favorite sports figure is Michael Jordan … greatest sports moment was making a game-winning buzzer-beater as a sophomore in high school ... hobbies include hiking, reading and traveling.
